title: Well GD, it's been a good long run
body:
My luck has just run out, and it's become very obvious that terrible things are about to happen.

Just summoned bunny Camilla, Effie, Jaffar and Caeda all at once, all 5 star units. 3 have attack boon. 

I'm so screwed, there's no way this week ends without something terrible happening since I've burned so much luck at once.
